overview_of_class: This course will explore post-World War II film from Poland. We will watch films by Andrzej Wajda, Krzysztof Kie?lowski, Andrzej Munk, Roman Polanski, and others. We will assess what the end of WWII, followed by joining the Eastern Bloc, the fall of communism, and the entry into post-Soviet Europe have meant for the film culture and the Polish national film tradition. The films will be viewed in the original language with English subtitles.
name: East European Literature and Visual Arts
subject: SLAVIC
